activities: DexCom will receive information from individuals located in the EEA and Switzerland who use its products and will process that information to support such individuals’ use of our products, and for DexCom’s internal business purposes to the extent permitted in our Privacy Policy.  Dexcom will also receive information regarding applicants for employment by and employees of its Swiss subsidiary.
personaldata: registration information, feedback provided to us, information arising from the use of our products, website use information, and information derived from the foregoing, all as set forth in our Privacy Policy.  Data from applicants for employment by our Swiss subsidiary and from employees of our Swiss subsidiary.
